Description: Located in Mid-Somerville between Porter Square and steps from the Gilman Square Green Line Extension within a multifamily house, this sunny spacious 3 bedroom apartment features hardwood floors, large bedrooms including one that has its own office! Perfect sized living room with china cabinet and eat in kitchen with dishwasher/disposal. High ceilings with lots of windows! Laundry is on the premises. Cats allowed! Available 9/1/2023.
